Name: Occupy White Walls
About the game: In Occupy White Walls , you can create a museum and curate its contents. Construct a space, fill it with art that is personal to you, and open its doors to welcome the world! OWW is powered by a first-of-its-kind art discovery AI called DAISY and has a fun, creative, and grown-up player community. (just don’t call it ‘Hipster Minecraft’ ) Build in a creative sandbox environment with thousands of unique assets. There is no limit to your creativity. Custom Music Include your own music and share it with others A grownup community with entertaining and inspiring personalities Explore tens of thousands of inspiring, creative spaces created by players Collaborative building - Build with friends (or strangers) Pixel Art Galore - Get creative and create custom art with interactive mosaics DAISY, a groundbreaking art discovery AI - Discover art you never knew you'd like without needing any prior art knowledge MAISY (DAISY's little sister)- an AI to help you find similar artworks Discover artworks from historical masters like Monet to artworks from a vast array of contemporary artists from an ever-growing database of tens of thousands of artworks. OWW for artists - Upload your art into the game and discover new audiences using the power of DAISY, AI. Kultura -artists Visit the Plaza and see what strange new assets Larry and Peggy offer daily
